# git fetch --depth 10000

git checkout a8ac7ea5fe9339558c9fbe49acaa1a2452bcd4d0 pango.rb
brew reinstall pango
brew pin pango

entry.title: Capybara Webkitã‹ã‚‰Headless Chromeã«ç§»è¡Œ
entry.content:
ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«

# Gemfile
group :test do
  gem 'selenium-webdriver'
  gem 'chromedriver-helper'
  ...
end

chromedriver ã¯ brew install chromedriver ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«gemã§ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã™ã‚‹ã¨æ¥½ã ã‘ã©ã€gemã®å ´åˆã€ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦å°‘ã—å¿µé ­ã«å…¥ã‚Œã¦ãŠã„ãŸã»ã†ãŒã„ã„ã‹ã‚‚ã€‚
CircleCIã ã¨imageã« circleci/ruby:2.4.1-node-browsers ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚Œã° chromedriver ã¨ã‹è‰²ã€…ã¨å…¥ã‚Œã¦ãã‚Œã¦ã€ç‰¹ã«è¨­å®šç­‰ã—ãªãã¦ã‚‚å‹•ãã€‚

è¨­å®š

# spec/rails_helper.rb
require 'selenium/webdriver'

...

Capybara.register_driver :headless_chrome do |app|
  capabilities = Selenium::WebDriver::Remote::Capabilities.chrome(
    chromeOptions: { args: %w(headless disable-gpu window-size=1280,800) }
  )

  Capybara::Selenium::Driver.new app, browser: :chrome, desired_capabilities: capabilities
end
Capybara.javascript_driver = :headless_chrome

ä¿®æ­£ãŒå¿…è¦ã ã£ãŸã®ã¯ trigger, alert, drag_to å‘¨ã‚Šã§ã€æœ€æ–°ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã ã¨ save_and_open_screenshot ã‚‚æ­£å¸¸ã«å‹•ä½œã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

entry.title: Webpackerã§å…¥ã‚ŒãŸVueã«ESLintã‚’ä½¿ã†
entry.content:
ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«

yarn add --dev eslint eslint-loader eslint-plugin-import eslint-config-airbnb-base eslint-plugin-vue@beta

è¨­å®š

// .eslintrc
{
  env: {
    browser: true
  },
  'extends': [
    'airbnb-base',
    'plugin:vue/recommended'
  ]
}

// config/webpack/development.js
const environment = require('./environment')

environment.loaders.set('eslint', {
  test: /\.(js|vue)$/,
  loader: 'eslint-loader',
  enforce: 'pre',
  options: {
    failOnWarning: true
  }
})

module.exports = environment.toWebpackConfig()

options ã®è¨­å®šã¯å…¬å¼ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«ã€ä¾‹ãˆã° failOnWarning: true ã ã¨buildã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚„ãƒ­ã‚°ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã€ failOnWarning: false ã«ã™ã‚‹ã¨buildã¯ã¨ãŠã£ã¦ãƒ­ã‚°ã«ã ã‘ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒæ®‹ã‚‹ã€‚
